content.description:
This has fairly easy climbing, probably around 5.7, but the high-ball factor adds to the grade. It is best to do it in the dark as it's on private property. Start to the left of the gutter on the prominent, south-facing wall. Climb straight up using the small ledges of the brick facade until you top out on the roof of the hotel.

Downclimb one story left of the wall to the stairs, which you can take to the bottom.
content.protection: There is no pro. This is a free solo.
content.location: Get to the Millennium Harvest House. This route is located on the south side of the building directly across from Boulder Creek. Start on the ground level left of the gutter.
